statements: SELECT * FROM iot_devices ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT device_name, temperature FROM iot_devices WHERE humidity > 50;
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM iot_devices WHERE soil_moisture < 30 ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT device_name, location, soil_moisture FROM iot_devices WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT * FROM iot_devices WHERE location LIKE '%kitchen%' ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_name, temperature FROM iot_devices WHERE humidity > 50 ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM iot_devices WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND humidity < 70 ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT device_name, location, humidity FROM iot_devices WHERE temperature > 25 AND soil_moisture < 0.5;
SELECT device_name, temperature, humidity, soil_moisture FROM iot_devices WHERE temperature > 30 AND (humidity < 60 OR soil_moisture > 0.8);
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM iot_devices WHERE humidity > 60 AND (temperature < 20 OR location = 'Indoor') ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT DeviceID, Temperature, Humidity FROM DeviceData
SELECT CropType, SoilMoisture, PHLevel FROM FieldConditions
SELECT * FROM DeviceData WHERE Temperature > 30
SELECT DeviceID, SensorID, Temperature, Humidity FROM DeviceData WHERE Humidity < 60
SELECT FieldID, CropType, SoilMoisture, PHLevel FROM FieldConditions WHERE WeedDetection = TRUE
SELECT * FROM DeviceData WHERE Temperature > 30 ORDER BY Timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT DeviceID, SensorID, Temperature FROM DeviceData WHERE Humidity < 50 ORDER BY DeviceID ASC;
SELECT FieldID, CropType FROM FieldConditions WHERE SoilMoisture BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY CropType;
SELECT DeviceID, Temperature, Humidity FROM DeviceData WHERE Temperature < 25 OR Humidity > 70 ORDER BY DeviceID ASC, Timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM FieldConditions WHERE CropType = 'Corn' AND PHLevel < 6 OR WeedDetection = TRUE ORDER BY FieldID DESC;
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT device_name, location, status FROM devices ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT device_name, location, temperature, humidity FROM devices JOIN sensor_data ON devices.device_id = sensor_data.device_id;
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT device_name, temperature, humidity FROM devices JOIN sensor_data ON devices.device_id = sensor_data.device_id;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 70 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, MAX(temperature) AS max_temperature FROM sensor_data GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_name, device_type, location FROM devices;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_data FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT field_name, crop_type, size_acres FROM fields WHERE size_acres > 5;
SELECT * FROM sensor_readings WHERE reading_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY value ASC;
SELECT location, device_name FROM devices JOIN sensors ON devices.device_id = sensors.device_id WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature';
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Temperature Sensor'
SELECT sensor_type, sensor_data FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Humidity Sensor' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT field_name, size_acres FROM fields WHERE size_acres > 5 AND crop_type = 'Corn'
SELECT value, reading_time FROM sensor_readings WHERE sensor_id = 101 ORDER BY reading_time ASC
SELECT d.device_name, s.sensor_type, sr.value, sr.reading_time FROM devices d JOIN sensors s ON d.device_id = s.device_id JOIN sensor_readings sr ON s.sensor_id = sr.sensor_id
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'phone';
SELECT device_name, last_update FROM devices ORDER BY last_update DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type, location FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'laptop' ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'tablet' ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Mobile' ORDER BY last_update DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices JOIN sensors ON devices.device_id = sensors.device_id WHERE sensors.sensor_value > 50 ORDER BY devices.device_name ASC, sensors.timestamp DESC;
SELECT field_name, crop_type, area FROM fields WHERE area > 100 ORDER BY field_name ASC;

SELECT s.sensor_type, d.device_name, f.field_name FROM sensors s JOIN devices d ON s.device_id = d.device_id JOIN field_sensors fs ON s.sensor_id = fs.sensor_id JOIN fields f ON fs.field_id = f.field_id WHERE d.device_name = 'SmartFarming' ORDER BY f.field_name DESC;
SELECT MAX(log_value) AS max_value, MIN(log_value) AS min_value FROM data_logs GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING MAX(log_value) - MIN(log_value) > 10 ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;
